page.title: 11LIFESTYLES IN PATCHWAY
page.content: Fashion is quite varied today.For discos you might wear a mini skirt or trousers, but longer skirts are worn in the day.You occasionally see punks in Patchway,some with an ear-ring through their nose,chains, or black leather jackets with zips on them. Some people have coloured hair. Most ladies have short hair in a bobbed style. In the area people enjoy gardening, wine-making and cookery.Sports such as football,squash, tennis and swimming are also popular.You can play tennis and football at Patchway High but swimmers must go to Thornbury or Filton. People eat a lot of convenience food,using gadgets such as microwaves and deep freezers.The local hypermarket sells both convenience and fresh foods.
